HDG.LOG.content: [method, cut out the chaff, what cheapens] everything facile, trite & vacuous > send essence of man reeling (ins Wanken bringt), devastate him, if this dispensation becomes destiny [?] [wouldn’t this take us beyond Being?]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: [method, cut out the chaff, what cheapens] everything facile, trite & vacuous > send essence of man reeling (ins Wanken bringt), devastate him, if this dispensation becomes destiny [?] [wouldn’t this take us beyond Being?]

HDG.LOG.content: having-seen & having-heard not mere grasping (Erfassen), a certain kind of behavior (Verhalten) > this abiding (hält) as devoting to what lies-before, dispatching toward [both devote & dispatch forms of schicken], such behavior is appropriate (schickliches) thus skillful (geschickt), sophon thus is fateful (geschicklich)
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: having-seen & having-heard not mere grasping (Erfassen), a certain kind of behavior (Verhalten) > this abiding (hält) as devoting to what lies-before, dispatching toward [both devote & dispatch forms of schicken], such behavior is appropriate (schickliches) thus skillful (geschickt), sophon thus is fateful (geschicklich)

HDG.LOG.content: logos: assembly of that which sends everything into its own > secures everything in the totality
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: logos: assembly of that which sends everything into its own > secures everything in the totality

HDG.LOG.content: en as Zeus [as legein?] [?] > [Zeus: highest present being—not Being???] > to name, to call forward, that which is laid down/gathered in name comes to light [Zeus as the dispatcher, lightning bolt as sending, of gathering]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: en as Zeus [as legein?] [?] > [Zeus: highest present being—not Being???] > to name, to call forward, that which is laid down/gathered in name comes to light [Zeus as the dispatcher, lightning bolt as sending, of gathering]

HDG.LOG.content: path for mortal thinking [?], in more primordial origin of logos [?] > logos needs omologein if present beings are to shine in presencing > omologein dispatches itself w/out presumption into the measuring (schickt sich unvermessen in das Ermessen) of logos [that Being needs human logos?]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: path for mortal thinking [?], in more primordial origin of logos [?] > logos needs omologein if present beings are to shine in presencing > omologein dispatches itself w/out presumption into the measuring (schickt sich unvermessen in das Ermessen) of logos [that Being needs human logos?]

HDG.TB.content: [Augustine] beginning of Western thinking, Being is thought, not as “It gives” as such, latter withdraws in favor of gift which it gives > giving which gives only its gift, in giving holds itself back and withdraws, such a giving we call sending [lookup] > Being—that which It gives—is what is sent [other names for Being]
HDG.TB.linkedContent: [Augustine] beginning of Western thinking, Being is thought, not as “It gives” as such, latter withdraws in favor of gift which it gives > giving which gives only its gift, in giving holds itself back and withdraws, such a giving we call sending [lookup] > Being—that which It gives—is what is sent [other names for Being]

HDG.TB.content: [the sending & what is sent] history of Being, destiny of Being, the sending & It which sends forth hold back w/ their self-manifestation, hold back as epoche, thus we can speak of epochs of destiny of Being > [method] gradual removal of these obscuring covers [epochs]
HDG.TB.linkedContent: [the sending & what is sent] history of Being, destiny of Being, the sending & It which sends forth hold back w/ their self-manifestation, hold back as epoche, thus we can speak of epochs of destiny of Being > [method] gradual removal of these obscuring covers [epochs]

HDG.FS.content: no destinal (geschickliche) epoch of Ereignis: sending is from enowning (Das Schicken ist aus dem Ereignen) > return to Greeks only has meaning as a return to Being [?] > “step back (Schritt züruck)” (step that retreats [züruckgeht] from metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics]) has sole meaning of enabling (ermöglichen) glance ahead (Vorausblick) to what comes (was kommt) [to-come], thinking begins anew: in essence of technology thought catches sight of heralding portent (verdeckenden Vor-Schein), die verbergende Vor-Erscheinung des Ereignisses selbst
HDG.FS.linkedContent: no destinal (geschickliche) epoch of Ereignis: sending is from enowning (Das Schicken ist aus dem Ereignen) > return to Greeks only has meaning as a return to Being [?] > “step back (Schritt züruck)” (step that retreats [züruckgeht] from metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics]) has sole meaning of enabling (ermöglichen) glance ahead (Vorausblick) to what comes (was kommt) [to-come], thinking begins anew: in essence of technology thought catches sight of heralding portent (verdeckenden Vor-Schein), die verbergende Vor-Erscheinung des Ereignisses selbst

HDG.FS.content: as technology unfolds objectivity (Gegenständlichkeit) (as a manner of sending) transforms more into standing reservedness (Beständlichkeit) > no longer objects today only standing reserves (beings held in readiness for being consumed [Verbrauchtwerden]), no longer substances but subsistances > energy politics, politics of agriculture: systematic ordering of space w/in general planning, directed toward future exploitation (Ausbeutung), everything arranged in horizon of utility: orderability (Bestellbarkeit) [better than Beherrschung] of what is to be seized > for example: forest as “greenspace” (stock, supply, means)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: as technology unfolds objectivity (Gegenständlichkeit) (as a manner of sending) transforms more into standing reservedness (Beständlichkeit) > no longer objects today only standing reserves (beings held in readiness for being consumed [Verbrauchtwerden]), no longer substances but subsistances > energy politics, politics of agriculture: systematic ordering of space w/in general planning, directed toward future exploitation (Ausbeutung), everything arranged in horizon of utility: orderability (Bestellbarkeit) [better than Beherrschung] of what is to be seized > for example: forest as “greenspace” (stock, supply, means)

HDG.FS.content: experience of instancy in clearing of Being, only possible through detour (Umweg) of return to beginning > return occurs in echo of Parmenides, the hearing that opens in our present age (epoch of sending [Schickung] of being as Ge-stell)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: experience of instancy in clearing of Being, only possible through detour (Umweg) of return to beginning > return occurs in echo of Parmenides, the hearing that opens in our present age (epoch of sending [Schickung] of being as Ge-stell)
